boone

Class Brain

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.Brain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Brain
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storable, java.lang.Cloneable
    A brain containing a number of NeuralNets (brain areas) and DataSets (memories).
    Since:
    2004-11-09 19:54
    Version:
    $Id: Brain.java 2294 2016-04-18 11:38:16Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer
